title: Doing foo is not recommended, consider using bar
message: `foo` is deprecated since version 1.2.3, please use `bar`.

title: Quick tip, avoid drinking too much beer
message: Beer is one of the oldest and most widely consumed alcoholic drinks in the world, but drink in moderation!

title: ArithmeticException
message:
